title: Bain Capital Ventures Closes Two Funds at $1.3 Billion
sub_head: Bain Capitalâ€™s venture-capital arm is pivoting toward early-stage startups
body:
Bain Capital Ventures has closed two new funds worth a combined $1.3 billion that will mostly target early-stage startups, as it continues to pivot away from growth investments.
The fresh capital raised by the venture-capital arm of private-equity giant Bain Capital will back a $950 million core fund for seed and Series A investments and a $350 million co-investment fund for growth opportunities. The infusion lifts assets under management to $8.3 billion.
